name: Domain Opportunity Scan
description: Systematically scan a domain for unmet needs using STEEP framework (Social/Tech/Economic/Environmental/Political)

name: How Might We
description: Reframe pain points as opportunity questions to unlock creative solution space

name: Pain Brainstorm
description: Generate exhaustive list of potential customer pains in a domain using breadth-first thinking

name: Pain Atomization
description: Break one broad pain into atomic sub-pains to find the sharpest most actionable needle
output: Atomic pain map with FIP scores

name: Wedge Storming
description: Generate multiple wedge entry point hypotheses — what is the smallest piece we could sell first?

name: Value Proposition Sprint
description: Rapidly generate and stress-test 5+ value propositions against the validated pain

name: Business Model Exploration
description: Map 5+ different business model options using the BMC lens before selecting one

name: Reverse Pitch
description: Each team member argues why the venture should be KILLED — surfaces hidden risks and weaknesses

name: Competitor Teardown
description: Deep analysis of 3 top competitors: what they do well gaps and where we can win

name: From/To Story Sprint
description: Craft the venture transformation story: what does the world look before vs after our solution?

name: Asset Jam
description: Collaborative exercise to identify all mothership capabilities the venture can leverage (IP data customers brand tech)

name: ICP Definition Workshop
description: Define the Ideal Customer Profile: demographics psychographics behaviors pain intensity buying power

name: Concept Card Sprint
description: Create 3-5 concept cards representing different solution directions for customer testing
